name: Christmas Catastrophe
description:
Christmas Catastrophe

In Christmas Catastrophe you need to help Santa collect all the gifts he lost during bad weather. And since Santa is extra nice this year, you will need to avoid coal.

This game was made with Christmas Game Jams in mind. Development started on Sunday 11 November and worked on, on/off, till Thursday 15 November. I hope you like the game in some sense, the goal was to make something simple yet fun. Constructive Criticism is alsways welcome.

The assets are all open source and from the webs. I cut up the vectors and animated them. The Game Design and Programming is done by me.

A android version is in the works and will be released later this week, if finshed on time.

Tools

  • Unity
  • Adobe Illustrator
  • Adobe Photoshop
  • SVG Renderer

Assets

  • Freepik
  • Incompetech

Detailed crediting can be find in the downloadable PDF.
